title: WebQoof: Photo of TDP Workers With Anti-Naidu Posters was Morphed
subtitle: Pictures on Twitter show young men clad in yellow T-shirts baring the logo of a cycle holding placards that claim ‘Naidu Symbol of Shame’, and ‘Naidu We Feel Ashamed’.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
Pictures on Twitter show young men clad in yellow T-shirts baring the logo of a cycle holding placards that claim ‘Naidu Symbol of Shame’, and ‘Naidu We Feel Ashamed’.

The men are supposedly workers from Andhra Pradesh Chief Minister Chandrababu Naidu’s Telugu Desam Party (TDP), as can be discerned from the logo of the cycle on their T-shirts.
